log.title: Comcast Open Source Softwate Launched
log.excerpt: A redesign and rearchitecture of the Comcast Open Source Software website. New features include a virtual conference, yoctometers, and zoophobia. Designed to use the Comcast corporate styles guide. Rearchitected to take advantage of some of the latest features available through GitHub.
